profile.name: Andy127
profile.description: Hi, my name is Andy and I am fascinated by visual arts since childhood. I hope that I will have the opportunity to work with other artists and create amazing art projects here.

myProjects.name: Symbolism Short Film
myProjects.about: This is an experimental film on symbolism, which explores the abstract.
myProjects.lookingFor: Looking for an editor, a vfx person, and a writer
myProjects.creator: owner

myProjects.name: Typography Poster
myProjects.about: This is a typography poster that plays around with types and compositions.
myProjects.lookingFor: Looking for someone who is also interested in exploring types and how to use types to convey meanings
myProjects.creator: owner

myProjects.name: The river from Hometown
myProjects.about: This is an ink illustration of a river near my house from Beijing.
myProjects.lookingFor: Looking for someone who is also interested in landscape in Beijing to do some coloring.
myProjects.creator: owner

collabs.name: Portrait of Ruby Moon
collabs.about: A portrait of Ruby Moon in realistic style; oil painting
collabs.lookingFor: Another person who is advanced in oil painting and is experienced in painting portraits.
collabs.creator: owner

collabs.name: Kingdom of Stickfigures
collabs.about: This is a short animation that aims to experiment basic animation techniques.
collabs.lookingFor: Looking for 1 person with intermediate to advanced illustration skills and 1 writer who is interested in developing the plot.
collabs.creator: owner

collabs.name: The Dream of Thousand Paper Crane
collabs.about: This is a fundarising event aiming to help support elementary school children in the countryside of Shanghai.
collabs.lookingFor: Looking for 2 people who are willing to dedicate time to fold paper crane, and 1 organizer to help with fundarising.
collabs.creator: owner

collabs.name: Lunar New Year Memories
collabs.about: This is a photography series that aims record the happiness of celebrating Chinese lunar new year.
collabs.lookingFor: Looking for 2 other photographers who are willing to participate
collabs.creator: owner

collabs.name: I Miss You
collabs.about: This is a an expeirmental 3D design project.
collabs.lookingFor: Looking for 1 person who is familiar with Maya and 1 writer.
collabs.creator: owner

users.name: Jstar
users.description: A person who is interested in visual arts.

users.name: QwQ1125
users.description: Hello! I am a college student who likes to watch a lot of animes, and that was what motivated me to create my own animation! If you are also interested in creating your own story, please feel free to connect with me! Can't wait to work with you all!

users.name: Minimini
users.description: Hi there. My name is Minimini, you can just call me Mini! I am hanging around to see if I can meet other brilliant minds that will inspire me.

users.name: LilyWhite
users.description: Hello, I am LilyWhite, and I am a professional designer who is specificially interested in graphic design, illustration and 3D design.
